titles.title: To amend title 13, United States Code, to provide that decennial census questionnaires be limited to requesting only the information required by the Constitution.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Reform.
Referred to the Subcommittee on the Census.

bill.summary: 3/23/2000--Introduced. Provides that in connection with any decennial census of population, the Secretary of Commerce is authorized to request no information aside from the number of individuals residing or staying at a particular address or location and their names.
